Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI can provide feedback on the spot, whereas waiting for teacher feedback can take a fair amount of time. teachers are also often only allowed to provide very generalised feedback on structure or content, whereas GenAI can give specific feedback on language, vocabulary and syntax.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: both types of feedback are useful.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: i would trust feedback from a teacher whereas I would utilise feedback from GenAI with caution.
